text: 11:21: Aij 23:1-18; Ezkh 26:1—28:26; Jol 3:4-8; Ams 1:9,10; Zekh 9:2-4 Chorijin! Nathek shii khama diig ro, nathek khama diig ro, Bethsaida! Buangthek yi nathek shii rek phi pha ji ne Thaire nane Sidon shii rek phi arone, branthek ne khuchung è de awaithek layogthek è thadoh khidjong rone doh yi pha thiilo guii ne siphie shun ne raijong ro!
